001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
012
013import java.util.Map;
014import java.util.Set;
015import java.util.WeakHashMap;
016
017/**
018 * Custom optimizer that implements Cumulative with Reset Gradient Descent algorithm.
019 * We keep accumulating the parameterGradients, but reset them once we are going to oscillate.
020 *
021 * @param <N>
022 */
023public class ARGOptimizer<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N> {
024
025    private final Map<LinearCombination<N>, Array<N>> accumulatedGradients = new WeakHashMap<>();
026
027    private N learningRate;
028
029    public ARGOptimizer(N learningRate) {
030        this.learningRate = learningRate;
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
035        Array<N> accumulatedGradients = this.accumulatedGradients.computeIfAbsent(model, k -> model.getNumberTypeSupport().createArray(model.getParameterCount()));
036        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getNumberTypeSupport();
037
038        Array<N> parameters = model.getParameters();
039        Vector<N> thetas = new TypedVector<>(parameters, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport());
040        Vector<N> regularizationGradients = Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
041
042        for (int i = 0; i < regularizationGradients.getDimensions(); i++) {
043            N newGradient = regularizationGradients.get(i + 1);
044            if (typeSupport.hasSameSign(newGradient, accumulatedGradients.get(i))) {
045                accumulatedGradients.set(i, typeSupport.add(accumulatedGradients.get(i), newGradient));
046            } else {
047                accumulatedGradients.set(i, newGradient);
048            }
049        }
050
051        return new TypedVector<>(accumulatedGradients, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport()).multiply(model.getNumberTypeSupport().negate(learningRate));
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
056        return Map.of(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
057    }
058
059    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
060    @Override
061    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
062        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
063            this.learningRate = (N) value;
064        }
065    }
066}
